name: RestaurantPicker
0:
”Alexa, ask Restaurant Picker where can i get Chinese food near Boston”
”Alexa, open Restaurant Picker and give me some sushi bars recommendations near detroit”
”Alexa, ask Restaurant Picker for a tapas restaurant near Los Angeles”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restaurant picker
des: This skill recommends restaurants based off of the user's desired restaurant type and location. The recommendations use the Yelp API to return the most relevant restaurant to the user's request.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
